name: 2nd International Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development
content: 2nd International Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development 2025 Dates: 26-28 September 2025 Location: London, UK Venue: University of London, Senate House, Malet St, London WC1E 7HU Why Attend the 2nd International Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development (ESDCONF) 2025? Be part of the 2nd International Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development (ESDCONF) 2025 in London, a city celebrated for its intellectual rigor and cultural richness. This conference is the ideal gathering for professionals and academics committed to sustainability and environmental research. ESDCONF 2025 offers a dynamic platform for sharing innovative ideas, discovering cutting-edge research, and forging valuable connections with experts from around the globe. Key Highlights Engage with Global Thought Leaders: Participate in thought-provoking sessions, workshops, and panels led by renowned researchers, policy makers, and experts who are at the forefront of sustainable development. Presentation Flexibility: Present your research in a format that suits you—whether in person, virtually, or as a poster. ESDCONF 2025 provides flexible options to ensure everyone can contribute. Listeners are encouraged to attend and join in on the discussions. Exceptional Networking Opportunities: Build meaningful connections with professionals, academics, and researchers from all over the world. This conference creates a supportive environment for collaborations and new research initiatives. Cultural Experience in London: Take advantage of your time in London, a global hub of history, art, and innovation. With its academic prestige and vibrant atmosphere, London offers the perfect setting to enjoy the conference while exploring the city’s treasures. Publishing Opportunities: Presenters have the chance to publish their work in the conference proceedings with ISBN and DOI, as well as submit to selected peer-reviewed journals and edited volumes. Important Dates Abstract Submission Deadline: 05 September 2025 Acceptance Notification: 7-14 days after submission Early Registration Deadline: 20 March 2025 Late Registration Deadline: 16 September 2025 Conference Dates: 26-28 September 2025
